title: Bug 5629Outliner does not automatically open when selecting a search result
description: Bug 5629Outliner does not automatically open when selecting a search result
OB: Build 207 (20011101)When performing a search action in the Java perspective, and having multiplesearch results available; if I doubleclick on a search match, then it opensfine in the Java editor, but the outliner does not show me anything until Iclick inside the editor.
SR: Build 207 (20011101)When performing a search action in the Java perspective, and having multiplesearch results available; if I doubleclick on a search match, then it opensfine in the Java editor, but the outliner does not show me anything until Iclick inside the editor.
